item.title: about/
item.description: About me With 10 years of experience in technology and almost 5 years dedicated to Information Security, I have worked in various areas, gaining specialized skills. My main activities include: CyberSec Analyst (Security Operation Center - SOC): I conducted continuous monitoring of systems and networks, identifying threats and security incidents. I analyzed logs, responded swiftly to incidents, mitigated attacks, and produced detailed reports on critical events. CyberSec Analyst (Pentester): I performed penetration tests (pentests) on networks, systems, and web applications, identifying vulnerabilities and proposing solutions to mitigate them.
